segments.text: I see the cookie jar, and it’s making me hungry just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies, and I don’t blame him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl waiting patiently, and it’s kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the cookies are homemade or store-bought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so carefully, and it’s impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they don’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is making me nervous, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at their teamwork; it’s so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re just kids being kids, and it’s making me happy to watch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they enjoy those cookies; they’ve earned them.
segments.speaker: PAR
